mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLY(club_num, member_num, apply_date) VALUES (#{clubNum}, #{memberNum}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM APPLY WHERE club_num = #{clubNum} AND member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT into apply (member_num, club_num, apply_date) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{clubNum},now())
mapper.select: SELECT apply_num as applyNum, club_num as clubNum, member_num as memberNum FROM apply WHERE member_num = #{memberNum}
